content:
Hi Team,

I have created observation record HAPI and its stored successfully. When I search same observations resources the latest records created is not reflected. If I try after 5-6 seconds it reflects. Is it normal behaviour?

I am using https://www.npmjs.com/package/fhir-crud-client library in my react application to perform CRUD operations with HAPI FHIR.

Regards,
Kishore

I have gone through below link. This is due to caching enabled as default configuration and its expected behaviour.

https://hapifhir.io/hapi-fhir/docs/server_jpa/configuration.html
